means: 使（某人）迷失方向( disorient的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: An abrupt change of location can be disorienting.
sentence.Network_cn: 地点的突然改变会令人迷失方向。

sentence.Network_en: A sharp blow to the head can be disorienting.
sentence.Network_cn: 对脑部的重击会导致昏迷.

sentence.Network_en: It is hard to exaggerate the disorienting pace of change in that period.
sentence.Network_cn: 再怎么夸大那个年代的动荡都不为过分.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Kunlun' s fans may have to get used to such disorienting treatment : the assumed purpose of its capital raising is to buy more assets from petrochina .昆仑能源的追捧者可能必须习惯这种令人疑惑的手法：它的融资目的可能是向中石油收购更多资产。

list.abs: navigation among multiple application views or Web pages is perhaps the most disorienting kind of navigation for users .在多个视图或者网页之间的导航对用户来说或许是最容易迷失方向的导航。
fellows , you will be surprised to know that even mentally sick , sexually frustrated and politically disoriented people like me have a conscience .伙计们，你们得知像我这样精神上有毛病、性生活上失意、政治上迷失方向的人还有良心肯定会感到惊异的。
new immigrants may feel disoriented in face of manifold cultural differences .在面对多重文化差异时，新移民者们可能会感到迷失方向。
I'm quite disoriented . which way is north ?我完全迷失方向了。哪一个方向是北？

entry.tran: 使迷失方向;使觉得迷惘
entry.def: If something disorients you, you lose your sense of direction, or you generally feel lost and uncertain, for example because you are in an unfamiliar environment.

example.ex: An overnight stay at a friend's house disorients me...
example.tran: 在朋友家过夜让我觉得晕晕乎乎的。

example.ex: They were disorientated by the smoke and were firing blindly into it.
example.tran: 他们在烟雾中迷失了方向，向里面胡乱射击了一通。

means.word_mean: 1. causing loss of physical or intellectual bearings;

sentences.sentence: "making so many turns to the right and then the left was completely disorienting"
"a sharp blow to the head can be disorienting"

auth_sentence.content: The effects of instability and discord can be truly disorienting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The effects of instability and discord can be truly disorienting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The effects of instability and discord can be truly disorienting.

auth_sentence.content: One maquette was a disorienting twist on classic Lovecraftian form.
auth_sentence.res_content: One maquette was a disorienting twist on classic Lovecraftian form.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One maquette was a disorienting twist on classic Lovecraftian form.

auth_sentence.content: Having one of their own as pope must be slightly disorienting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Having one of their own as pope must be slightly disorienting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Having one of their own as pope must be slightly disorienting.
